recipe.title: Cranberry Raspberry Sauce
ingredients: a 12-ounce bag of cranberries, picked over
a 10-ounce package frozen raspberries in light syrup, thawed
1/2 cup firmly packed light brown sugar
instructions: In a heavy saucepan combine the cranberries, the raspberries with the syrup, the brown sugar, and the cranberry juice cocktail, simmer the mixture, covered, stirring occasionally, for 10 to 15 minutes, or until the cranberries have burst and the sauce is thickened, and let the sauce cool.

In a heavy saucepan combine the cranberries, the raspberries with the syrup, the brown sugar, and the cranberry juice cocktail, simmer the mixture, covered, stirring occasionally, for 10 to 15 minutes, or until the cranberries have burst and the sauce is thickened, and let the sauce cool.
